Additional boroughs are supported via email alerts only if you register at https://www.owl.co.uk for free. These boroughs include Barking & Dagenham, Hackney, Redbridge, Tower Hamlets and Waltham Forest.

This app alerts you to incidents near to where you live or at your current location. Choose the postcode zones you're interested in and receive notifications the moment the police or council send a new alert to that area. 

If you get too many notifications you can switch them off and just read the latest alerts within the app, or if you don't get enough you can switch on notifications for all alerts in your borough.

OWL is supported by Hertfordshire Constabulary and also the Metropolitan Police in half of London Boroughs. For 16 years OWL has helped protect residents and businesses from crimes and scams, and now we have a mobile app to expand the accessibility of official police alerts.

Wisdom is about listening to great answers, meeting like-minded people, and finding inspiration ...

Through the lens of beautiful questions, Wisdom elicits conversation and deep reflection.  Some answers make you laugh, others make you cry. We’ve never heard anything like it ... it's life, with “all its sorrow, heartbreak and devastating beauty.”

While some apps tell you about the world, Wisdom helps you understand yourself.

By forging deep connections with interesting people, we all grow faster together. We kindly ask YOU to join us, so together we can create a wiser world!

TELL ME MORE ...

In addition to an infinite stream of wise listening, each day you’ll also get a new batch of voice intros of interesting people to listen to and meet—hand chosen to be relevant to you.

We’re a free, supportive audio community full of people who want to live their most productive and meaningful lives. On Wisdom, you can listen to & discuss dozens of topics from business, fitness, and dating to startups, religion, and beauty.

Meet your your next mentor, your next friend, or even get that work introduction that you need most.

WHAT IS WISDOM?

It’s a way of being in the world. It’s a calm mind, managed stress, and reduced anxiety. Wisdom is knowing when to take control and when to let go. It’s so much more than motivational quotes and morning routines.

Whether you are a frazzled parent, a dating app addict, or a struggling entrepreneur, you will find community, advice, and motivation in Wisdom.

Free advice, free answers to life’s questions … if it sounds too good to be true, that’s the magic ...

We mean for Wisdom what the Renaissance writer Alberti called “discourse in the public sphere.” Ideas arise where diverse people come together serendipitously to discuss matters of importance.

Wisdom is that gathering place at the intersection of experience, knowledge, and seeking.

So join us ... come listen and talk with thoughtful people and lend your voice to Wisdom!

It has never been easier to meet & talk with great people.

WHAT YOU CAN DO …

ASK ME ANYTHING - GET A VOICE REPLY!
We all have questions. Ask yours and benefit from the illuminating questions of others and the answers of experts.

FREE, UNLIMITED AUDIOGRAMS
Every time you answer a question, we convert your audio file into a beautiful audiogram movie, so you can share it far and wide.

MEET AND TALK WITH AMAZING PEOPLE
Hear how different people react to life’s common challenges to live their most meaningful lives.

ASK QUESTIONS AND GET ADVICE
Need help? Our experts are here to motivate you, either LIVE or, even simpler, you can ask a text question and get a voice answer.

SHARE YOUR WISDOM AND INSPIRE OTHERS
Add your voice and say the words that can change a life. Sharing is self-care!

DISCOVER CONVERSATIONS THAT MATTER
From Life & Wellness to Love & Dating, you will find communities with common interests.

PODCASTERS LOVE WISDOM
We are creator-friendly. Wisdom is a great way to take questions from your podcast audience.

ASK QUESTIONS AND GET ANSWERS ON POPULAR TOPICS …

* Better relationships, including dating
* Focus, concentration, and motivation
* Achieving professional goals and leadership
* Dealing with anxiety and reducing stress

* Podcasting industry ins and outs

* Experiencing personal growth as a spiritual being
* Guided meditations and mindfulness
* Diet, nutrition, and health

THE WISDOM IS REAL …

“When I wake up in the morning Wisdom is the first app that I open. I use it for my morning motivation.” - Cece Watson

“We are drowning in information, while starving for wisdom.” - E.O. Wilson

So, please, join us in our modest mission to leave the world a bit wiser than we found it. 

Download Wisdom today!

 - l’actualité en direct avec nos alertes, nos lives et notre fil « En continu »

 - nos contenus visuels (vidéos, infographies, photos…) et audio (podcasts)
 - un accès direct à nos séries thématiques.

Nous avons mis en place plusieurs fonctionnalités nouvelles, notamment la possibilité de passer en mode « sombre » ou de modifier la taille de la police pour optimiser le confort de lecture directement depuis l’article, ainsi qu’une accessibilité optimisée sur toute l’application. Grâce à cette application vous pourrez suivre :
 - l’ensemble de l’actualité 2021 en France : le suivi de la vaccination Covid-19, le début de la campagne présidentielle, les grands procès...
 - les grands événements en Europe et dans le monde : le suivi de l’épidémie dans le monde, les élections dans les différents pays du monde, la crise climatique et les grands enjeux internationaux…
 - toute l’actualité sportive : l’Euro de football, les Jeux Olympiques d’été à Tokyo, les équipes de France…

 - la diversité des contenus multimédias du Monde : vidéos, podcasts, animations, infographies…

S’abonner au « Monde » c’est :
